content: watch erika and monika demonstrate how to make custom crocheted sleeves to fit on any t-shirt on knitting daily tv episode 108 1 this project is excerpted from double stitch designs for the crochet fashionista 2 interweave 2008 the sleeve is worked in a continuous spiral do not join rounds sample projects uses less than 1 hank each of black autumn red copper kettle and chocolate -- it s a great project for using any leftover yarn 1 http //www knittingdailytv com/blogs/kdtv/archive/2008/07/01/kdtv0108 aspx 2 http //www interweave com/crochet/books/double_stitch/default asp
